title: White and RED All Over
body_text:
"It's been an unusual journey towards DODGEBALL CXL, but one damn worth the drive. And with only two events remaining, what more could possibly happen?
I am fully aware that team generals have not been publicly announced for the forthcoming DODGEBALL CXXX9 this Saturday. But you see, the element of surprise only sweetens the pot - or
pan
. Anyway, just show up this 24th of May for what will surely be a memorable evening. I personally guarantee it!
And for those of you living in darkness, let there be
white
!"
--- The WRITER
body_html:
"It's been an unusual journey towards DODGEBALL CXL, but one damn worth the drive. And with only two events remaining, what more could possibly happen?

I am fully aware that team generals have not been publicly announced for the forthcoming DODGEBALL CXXX9 this Saturday. But you see, the element of surprise only sweetens the pot - or pan. Anyway, just show up this 24th of May for what will surely be a memorable evening. I personally guarantee it!

And for those of you living in darkness, let there be white!"

--- The WRITER
